Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My teacher does not provide personal feedback as to how I can improve my work. The GenAI provides feedback which sometimes cant be applied to my work.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: There is not much feedback from my teacher and the feedback from genAI is frustrating because there are communication difficulties as it is a robot.
